channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- RVM – Responsive Vector Maps
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- RVM – Responsive Vector Maps

item.title: CVE-2021-24947|2024-08-03T19:49:13.473Z -- unknown -- rvm%20%E2%80%93%20responsive%20vector%20maps
item.description: The RVM WordPress plugin before 6.4.2 does not have proper authorisation, CSRF checks and validation of the rvm_upload_regions_file_path parameter in the rvm_import_regions AJAX action, allowing any authenticated user, such as subscriber, to read arbitrary files on the web server
